curfew.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a law that forces people to stay indoors after a particular time at night, or the time people must be indoors
curfew.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The government imposed a night-time curfew throughout the country.
The curfew was lifted  (=ended) on May 6th.
The whole town was placed under curfew.
Anyone found in the streets after curfew was shot.
curfew.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the time, decided by a parent, by which a child must be home or asleep in the evening
